positive_examples: This is an example of demon.
We observed demon in this context.
A typical case of demon would involve these features.
The concept of demon applies here.
A malevolent supernatural being often associated with evil or temptation.
negative_examples: This is an example of angel, not demon.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: Angel, or other types of Deity

definition: A malevolent supernatural being in various religious and mythological traditions.
